import React, { useState } from 'react'; import FileBase from 'react-file-base64'; const Form = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: "", link: "", image: "", description: "", type: "", catgories: "", mediaType: "", paid: "" }); return (
setFormData({ ...formData, image: base64 })} />
) } export default Form;
